meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Mexico and several other Latin American countries.
meanings.sent1: In Mexico, you can buy many things with just a few pesos.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for pesos before my trip to Mexico.
meanings.sent3: The pesos in my pocket jingled as I walked down the street.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was worth more than all the pesos in the world.
meanings.sent5: The colorful pesos looked like tiny pieces of art in my hand.

meanings.definition: A unit of weight in the Philippines, equal to 100 centavos.
meanings.sent1: She measured the rice in pesos to ensure accuracy.
meanings.sent2: The market vendor sold fruits by the kilo, not by pesos.
meanings.sent3: The chef's secret recipe called for a precise amount of pesos of each ingredient.
meanings.sent4: His love for her weighed more than a thousand pesos of gold.
meanings.sent5: The pesos of fish she caught were the biggest in the village.
